title: What is the biggest problem in philosophy right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: The biggest problem I know of (in philosophy) is: The general problem of evil. Why is God evil? Why are people evil? Why aren't we perfect? If we can't be perfect, is perfect evil? If evil is perfect why aren't we absolutely evil, or why do we care about evil if we can be perfect? Or is there no such thing as perfection? And, why can't we just be satisfied if there is no solution?
